verses.verse: And he heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Laban's <S%H3837><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> has taken <S%H3947><s%> away all <S%H3605><s%> that was our father's; <S%H1><s%> and of that which <S%H834><s%> was our father's <S%H1><s%> has he gotten <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this glory. <S%H3519><s%>
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> beheld <S%H7200><s%> the countenance <S%H6440><s%> of Laban, <S%H3837><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was not toward him as before. <S%H8543><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Return <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> and to your kindred; <S%H4138><s%> and I will be with you.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> and Leah <S%H3812><s%> to the field <S%H7704><s%> to his flock, <S%H6629><s%>

And said <S%H559><s%> to them, I see <S%H7200><s%> your father's <S%H1><s%> countenance, <S%H6440><s%> that it is not toward me as before; <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%> but the God <S%H430><s%> of my father <S%H1><s%> has been <S%H1961><s%> with me.
And you know <S%H3045><s%> that with all <S%H3605><s%> my power <S%H3581><s%> I have served <S%H5647><s%> your father. <S%H1><s%>

And your father <S%H1><s%> has deceived <S%H2048><s%> me, and changed <S%H2498><s%> my wages <S%H4909><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> times; <S%H4489><s%> but God <S%H430><s%> suffered <S%H5414><s%> him not to hurt <S%H7489><s%> me.

If <S%H518><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> thus, <S%H3541><s%> The speckled <S%H5348><s%> shall be your wages; <S%H7939><s%> then all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H6629><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> speckled: <S%H5348><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> thus, <S%H3541><s%> The ringstraked <S%H6124><s%> shall be your hire; <S%H7939><s%> then bore <S%H3205><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H6629><s%> ringstraked. <S%H6124><s%>
Thus God <S%H430><s%> has taken <S%H5337><s%> away the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> and given <S%H5414><s%> them to me.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass at the time <S%H6256><s%> that the cattle <S%H6629><s%> conceived, <S%H3179><s%> that I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> in a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the rams <S%H6260><s%> which leaped <S%H5927><s%> on the cattle <S%H6629><s%> were ringstraked, <S%H6124><s%> speckled, <S%H5348><s%> and spotted. <S%H1261><s%>
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to me in a dream, <S%H2472><s%> saying, Jacob: <S%H3290><s%> And I said, <S%H559><s%> Here <S%H2009><s%> am I.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Lift <S%H5375><s%> up now <S%H4994><s%> your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and see, <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the rams <S%H6260><s%> which leap <S%H5927><s%> on the cattle <S%H6629><s%> are ringstraked, <S%H6124><s%> speckled, <S%H5348><s%> and spotted: <S%H1261><s%> for I have seen <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that Laban <S%H3837><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> to you.

I am the God <S%H410><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> where <S%H834><s%> you anointed <S%H4886><s%> the pillar, <S%H4676><s%> and where <S%H834><s%> you vowed <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to me: now <S%H6258><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> get <S%H3318><s%> you out from this <S%H2063><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of your kindred. <S%H4138><s%>

And Rachel <S%H7354><s%> and Leah <S%H3812><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Is there yet <S%H5750><s%> any portion <S%H2506><s%> or inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for us in our father's <S%H1><s%> house? <S%H1004><s%>
Are we not counted <S%H2803><s%> of him strangers? <S%H5237><s%> for he has sold <S%H4376><s%> us, and has quite devoured <S%H398><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> our money. <S%H3701><s%>

For all <S%H3605><s%> the riches <S%H6239><s%> which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has taken <S%H5337><s%> from our father, <S%H1><s%> that is ours, and our children's: <S%H1121><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> then, whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> to you, do. <S%H6213><s%>
Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up, and set <S%H5375><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his wives <S%H802><s%> on camels; <S%H1581><s%>

And he carried <S%H5090><s%> away all <S%H3605><s%> his cattle, <S%H4735><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his goods <S%H7399><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had gotten, <S%H7408><s%> the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of his getting, <S%H7075><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had gotten <S%H7408><s%> in Padanaram, <S%H6307><s%> for to go <S%H935><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to shear <S%H1494><s%> his sheep: <S%H6629><s%> and Rachel <S%H7354><s%> had stolen <S%H1589><s%> the images <S%H8655><s%> that were her father's. <S%H1><s%>
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> stole <S%H1589><s%> away unawares <S%H3820><s%> <S%H3824><s%> to Laban <S%H3837><s%> the Syrian, <S%H761><s%> in that he told <S%H5046><s%> him not that he fled. <S%H1272><s%>

So he fled <S%H1272><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> that he had; and he rose <S%H6965><s%> up, and passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the river, <S%H5104><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> toward the mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>
And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was fled. <S%H1272><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> with him, and pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him seven <S%H7651><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%>journey; <S%H1870><s%> and they overtook <S%H1692><s%> him in the mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Laban <S%H3837><s%> the Syrian <S%H761><s%> in a dream <S%H2472><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Take <S%H3947><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> that you speak <S%H1696><s%> not to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> either good <S%H2896><s%> or <S%H5704><s%> bad. <S%H7451><s%>

Then Laban <S%H3837><s%> overtook <S%H5381><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Now Jacob <S%H3290><s%> had pitched <S%H8628><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> in the mount: <S%H2022><s%> and Laban <S%H3837><s%> with his brothers <S%H251><s%> pitched <S%H8628><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have you done, <S%H6213><s%> that you have stolen <S%H1589><s%> away unawares <S%H3820><s%> <S%H3824><s%> to me, and carried <S%H5090><s%> away my daughters, <S%H1323><s%> as captives <S%H7617><s%> taken with the sword? <S%H2719><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> did you flee <S%H1272><s%> away secretly, <S%H2244><s%> and steal <S%H1589><s%> away from me; and did not tell <S%H5046><s%> me, that I might have sent <S%H7971><s%> you away with mirth, <S%H8057><s%> and with songs, <S%H7892><s%> with tabret, <S%H8596><s%> and with harp? <S%H3658><s%>
And have not suffered <S%H5203><s%> me to kiss <S%H5401><s%> my sons <S%H1121><s%> and my daughters? <S%H1323><s%> you have now <S%H6258><s%> done foolishly <S%H5528><s%> in so doing. <S%H6213><s%>

It is in the power <S%H410><s%> of my hand <S%H3027><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> you hurt: <S%H7451><s%> but the God <S%H430><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to me last night, <S%H570><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> you heed <S%H8104><s%> that you speak <S%H1696><s%> not to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> either good <S%H2896><s%> or <S%H5704><s%> bad. <S%H7451><s%>

And now, <S%H6258><s%> though you would needs be gone, <S%H1980><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you sore longed <S%H3700><s%> after your father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> yet why <S%H4100><s%> have you stolen <S%H1589><s%> my gods? <S%H430><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> I was afraid: <S%H3372><s%> for I said, <S%H559><s%> Peradventure <S%H6435><s%> you would take <S%H1497><s%> by force <S%H1497><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> from me.

With whomsoever <S%H834><s%> you find <S%H4672><s%> your gods, <S%H430><s%> let him not live: <S%H2421><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> our brothers <S%H251><s%> discern <S%H5234><s%> you what <S%H4100><s%> is your with me, and take <S%H3947><s%> it to you. For Jacob <S%H3290><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not that Rachel <S%H7354><s%> had stolen <S%H1589><s%> them.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> tent, <S%H168><s%> and into Leah's <S%H3812><s%> tent, <S%H168><s%> and into the two <S%H8147><s%> maidservants' <S%H519><s%>tents; <S%H168><s%> but he found <S%H4672><s%> them not. Then went <S%H3318><s%> he out of Leah's <S%H3812><s%> tent, <S%H168><s%> and entered <S%H935><s%> into Rachel's <S%H7354><s%> tent. <S%H168><s%>

Now Rachel <S%H7354><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> the images, <S%H8655><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> them in the camel's <S%H1581><s%> furniture, <S%H3733><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> on them. And Laban <S%H3837><s%> searched <S%H4959><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tent, <S%H168><s%> but found <S%H4672><s%> them not.

And she said <S%H559><s%> to her father, <S%H1><s%> Let it not displease <S%H2734><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> that I cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> rise <S%H6965><s%> up before <S%H6440><s%> you; for the custom <S%H1870><s%> of women <S%H802><s%> is on me. And he searched <S%H2664><s%>but found <S%H4672><s%> not the images. <S%H8655><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was wroth, <S%H2734><s%> and strived <S%H7378><s%> with Laban: <S%H3837><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is my trespass? <S%H6588><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is my sin, <S%H2403><s%> that you have so hotly <S%H1814><s%> pursued <S%H1814><s%> after <S%H310><s%> me?

Whereas <S%H3588><s%> you have searched <S%H4959><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my stuff, <S%H3627><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> have you found <S%H4672><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your household <S%H1004><s%> stuff? <S%H3627><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> it here <S%H3541><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> my brothers <S%H251><s%> and your brothers, <S%H251><s%> that they may judge <S%H3198><s%> between <S%H996><s%> us both. <S%H8147><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> have I been with you; your ewes <S%H7353><s%> and your she goats <S%H5795><s%> have not cast <S%H7921><s%> their young, and the rams <S%H352><s%> of your flock <S%H6629><s%> have I not eaten. <S%H398><s%>

That which was torn <S%H2966><s%> of beasts <S%H2966><s%> I brought <S%H935><s%> not to you; I bore <S%H2398><s%> the loss <S%H2398><s%> of it; of my hand <S%H3027><s%> did you require <S%H1245><s%> it, whether stolen <S%H1589><s%> by day, <S%H3117><s%> or stolen <S%H1589><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

Thus I was; in the day <S%H3117><s%> the drought <S%H2721><s%> consumed <S%H398><s%> me, and the frost <S%H7140><s%> by night; <S%H3915><s%> and my sleep <S%H8142><s%> departed <S%H5074><s%> from my eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Thus <S%H2088><s%> have I been twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in your house; <S%H1004><s%> I served <S%H5647><s%> you fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for your two <S%H8147><s%> daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for your cattle: <S%H6629><s%> and you have changed <S%H2498><s%> my wages <S%H4909><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> times. <S%H4489><s%>

Except <S%H3884><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my father, <S%H1><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and the fear <S%H6343><s%> of Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> had been <S%H1961><s%> with me, surely <S%H3588><s%> you had sent <S%H7971><s%> me away now <S%H6258><s%> empty. <S%H7387><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has seen <S%H7200><s%> my affliction <S%H6040><s%> and the labor <S%H3018><s%> of my hands, <S%H3709><s%> and rebuked <S%H3198><s%> you last night. <S%H570><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> These daughters <S%H1323><s%> are my daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and these children <S%H1121><s%> are my children, <S%H1121><s%> and these cattle <S%H6629><s%> are my cattle, <S%H6629><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that you see <S%H7200><s%> is mine: and what <S%H4100><s%> can I do <S%H6213><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to these <S%H428><s%> my daughters, <S%H1323><s%> or <S%H176><s%> to their children <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have born? <S%H3205><s%>
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore come <S%H3212><s%> you, let us make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant, <S%H1285><s%> I and you; and let it be for a witness <S%H5707><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a stone, <S%H68><s%> and set <S%H7311><s%> it up for a pillar. <S%H4676><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> Gather <S%H3950><s%> stones; <S%H68><s%> and they took <S%H3947><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> an heap: <S%H1530><s%> and they did eat <S%H398><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> on the heap. <S%H1530><s%>
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> it Jegarsahadutha: <S%H3026><s%> but Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> it Galeed. <S%H1567><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> is a witness <S%H5707><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you this day. <S%H3117><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> was the name <S%H8034><s%> of it called <S%H7121><s%> Galeed; <S%H1567><s%>

And Mizpah; <S%H4709><s%> for he said, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> watch <S%H6822><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you, when <S%H3588><s%> we are absent <S%H5641><s%> one <S%H376><s%> from another. <S%H7453><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> you shall afflict <S%H6031><s%> my daughters, <S%H1323><s%> or if <S%H518><s%> you shall take <S%H3947><s%> other wives <S%H802><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> my daughters, <S%H1323><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is with us; see, <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is witness <S%H5707><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> heap, <S%H1530><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> this pillar, <S%H4676><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have cast <S%H3384><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you:

This <S%H2088><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> be witness, <S%H5707><s%> and this pillar <S%H4676><s%> be witness, <S%H5715><s%> that I will not pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> to you, and that you shall not pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> and this <S%H2063><s%> pillar <S%H4676><s%> to me, for harm. <S%H7451><s%>

The God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of their father, <S%H1><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> us. And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> by the fear <S%H6343><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%> Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> offered <S%H2076><s%> sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> on the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> bread: <S%H3899><s%> and they did eat <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and tarried <S%H3885><s%> all <S%H3885><s%> night in the mount. <S%H2022><s%>

And early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> up, and kissed <S%H5401><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> them: and Laban <S%H3837><s%> departed, <S%H3212><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> to his place. <S%H4725><s%>
